title: Short-Intensive Course on Utilizing Educational Video Games to Strengthen STEM Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic astronomy and advanced STEM field knowledge
context.additional_context: A game-based learning environment designed to enhance the job application skills of current professionals, with flexible learning progress via personal mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain astronomical concepts with 90% accuracy by accurately interpreting visual representations in games.
Learners can link game experiences to real-world work cases (e.g., data analysis, simulation interpretation) with 80% or higher relevance.
Learners can perform critical thinking at four or more levels (e.g., hypothesis verification, simulation adjustment) in game-based learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
